common package¶

Submodules¶

common.Clock module¶

Created on Oct 10, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

class common.Clock.Clock[source]¶
Variables:
  • isBroken – If true, profiling is off, and therefore we should not output data.
  • event_map – Maps the beginning and end of events.
event_map = {}¶
isBroken = False¶
printEvent(event)[source]¶
Parameters:event (string) – ID of the event that we want to print. If it does not exist, error.
printEvents()[source]¶

Prints out all completed events.

tack(event)[source]¶
Parameters:event (string) – ID of the event that may occur many times. Output will be the sum of these times.
tick(event)[source]¶
Parameters:event (string) – ID of the event that will be mapped. Used to match the start and end of the event.
tock(event)[source]¶
Parameters:event (string) – ID of the event that was already mapped. If it does not exist, error.

common.Common module¶

Created on Apr 28, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

common.Common.debug_print(string)[source]¶

Only prints the string if in DEBUG mode.

common.Common.getConstraintUID()[source]¶

Used to generate unique booleans for UNSAT core

common.Common.mAnd(*args)[source]¶

Short for MaybeAnd. Helper Function to simplify formulas passed to Z3, but mostly to make debugging output more comprehensible. Only applies the And function if there are actually multiple arguments.

common.Common.mOr(*args)[source]¶

Similar to mAnd

common.Common.max2(l, r)[source]¶

returns the min of two integers

common.Common.min2(l, r)[source]¶

returns the min of two integers

common.Common.reset()[source]¶

Only needed for running test suites.

common.Common.standard_print(string)[source]¶

Prints the string if not in TEST mode.
